title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
overview: Martin and Pola go to the Verne Dimension where they fight against Ayrton. Meanwhile, Diego and his friends discover that something is escaping from the Verne Dimension into the ocean, and they enlist Pompilio and Claudioâ€™s help to go search for it. In their quest, they encounter the Calliope and try to get its Captain on board with their plan to free the Verne Dimension.
